item.title: Rolf add a quote by Albert Einstein
item.description: "As far as the laws of mathematics refer to reality, they are not certain; and as far as they are certain, they do not refer to reality." -- Albert Einstein

item.title: Rolf add a quote by Albert Einstein
item.description: "Two things are infinite: the universe and human stupidity; and I'm not sure about the universe." -- Albert Einstein

item.title: Rolf add a quote by Joe Theismann
item.description: "Nobody in the game of football should be called a genius. A genius is somebody like Norman Einstein." -- Joe Theismann

item.title: Rolf add a quote by Albert Einstein
item.description: "Learn from yesterday, live for today, hope for tomorrow. The important thing is to not stop questioning." -- Albert Einstein

item.title: Rolf add a quote by Albert Einstein
item.description: "You can never solve a problem on the level on which it was created." -- Albert Einstein

item.title: Rolf add a quote by Narcotics Anonymous
item.description: "Insanity is doing the same thing, over and over again, but expecting different results." -- Narcotics Anonymous

item.title: Rolf add a quote by Albert Einstein
item.description: "Try not to become a man of success. Rather become a man of value." -- Albert Einstein

item.title: Rolf add a quote by Dianne Feinstein
item.description: "Winning may not be everything, but losing has little to recommend it." -- Dianne Feinstein

item.title: Rolf add a quote by Richard P. Feynman
item.description: "The first principle is that you must not fool yourself and you are the easiest person to fool." -- Richard P. Feynman

item.title: Rolf add a quote by Richard P. Feynman
item.description: "For a successful technology, reality must take precedence over public relations, for nature cannot be fooled." -- Richard P. Feynman

item.title: Rolf add a quote by Richard Feynman
item.description: "There are 10^11 stars in the galaxy. That used to be a huge number. But it's only a hundred billion. It's less than the national deficit! We used to call them astronomical numbers. Now we should call them economical numbers." -- Richard Feynman

item.title: Rolf add a quote by Jeanette Winterson
item.description: "I have a theory that every time you make an important choice, the part of you left behind continues the other life you could have had." -- Jeanette Winterson

item.title: Rolf add a quote by Kurt Vonnegut, Jr
item.description: "Dear future generations: Please accept our apologies. We were rolling drunk on petroleum." -- Kurt Vonnegut, Jr

item.title: Rolf add a quote by Mahatma Gandhi
item.description:
"Seven Deadly Sins
Wealth without work Pleasure without conscience Science without humanity Knowledge without character Politics without principle Commerce without morality Worship without sacrifice." -- Mahatma Gandhi

item.title: Rolf add a quote by Mark Twain
item.description: "Keep away from people who try to belittle your ambitions. Small people always do that, but the really great make you feel that you, too, can become great." -- Mark Twain

item.title: Rolf add a quote by Abraham Lincoln
item.description: "Nearly all men can stand adversity, but if you want to test a man's character, give him power." -- Abraham Lincoln
